title: Anyone know what the font is on the Giorgio Armani logo on the Samsung phones?
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20111213134428im_/http:/typophile.com/files/armani_5991.jpg)

That one, the circle type one.

I'm sure it's customized, I just need to figure out the actual font that is used for the G and A, I'm sure I've seen it before somewhere.

Thanks a whole lot. :)
author: Arian88

comments.content: I doubt that this even started as a font, but maybe the shapes remind you of [ITC Busorama](http://web.archive.org/web/20111213134428/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/urw/busorama/)?
Itâ€™s rather unlikely that this started out with a font.
